t: Trees of the Amazon - Ascent Of The Amazon
s: July 6, 2018 - Árvores da Amazônia The phrase “the lungs of our planet” is increasingly used to describe the Amazon Rainforest, both among the people of South America as well as globally. The phrase refers to the significant amount of oxygen produced by the trees and other plant life of the Amazon.
